maqras.text: Indeed human bol bol anxious
If touched adversity despondent
If zehnat wealth lakomstvo
Except for worshipers
Kto vzdy observe ich zmluva prayers (Salat)
Part ich peniaze je set aside
For chudobny chudobny
They verit v Dni Judgment
They reverence ich Lord's requital
Ich Lord's requital nie berie for granted
They keep ich chastity
(They have vztah) len ich spouses co bol legally ich
Ktokolvek transgresses these limits bol sinner
believers keep ich word they bol trustworthy
ICH testimony bol truthful
They consistently observe ich zmluva prayers (Salat) on cas
They zasluzit position honor Raj
Co keeping those je disbelieved joining ona
Do the ihned do vlavo they flee
Ako mozem any z them expect zapisat blissful Raj
Never; my created them they zauzlit z co
Ja solemnly swear Lord z easts zapad; my bol able
Do zastupid lepsie ludia tvoj miesto; my never defeated
Therefore let them omyl hraju they schodza dni awaiting them
Ze je dni they pojdem graves v a ponahlajte sa mat rad if herded (sacrificial) altars
S ich oci subdued shame pokryvka them. Ze je dni awaiting them
My sent Noah jeho zaludnit Ona warn tvoj ludia painful retribution afflicts them
He said O moj ludia ja je manifest warner do ona
Do alert ona ze ona kult GOD reverence Him obey mna
He potom forgive ona tvoj zhresit respite ona for predetermined period! vela assuredly GOD's appointment never zdrzat once it bol due ona len zauzlit
He said Moj Lord ja invited moj ludia night dni
Moj invitation len zvacsenie ich aversion
Whenever ja invited them forgiven Ona they miesto ich fingers ich ears pokryvka themselves s ich clothes insisted turned arrogant
Potom ja invited them publicly
Potom ja proclaimed them loudly ja spoke do them privately
Ja said Implore tvoj Lord forgiveness; He Forgiving
â€˜He potom lejak ona generously dazo
Zadovazit ona peniaze dieta orchards streams
Why ona nie strive should reverence GOD
He bol Jeden created ona do rezirovat
Ona nie realize lenze GOD created 7 universes do robit layers
He zamyslat moon therein bol lahky miesto sun bol lampa
GOD germinated ona zem zasadit
Potom He spatny listok ona it He iste bring ona out
GOD robit ZEM habitable ONA
Ze ona build cesta therein
Noah said Moj Lord they disobeyed mi nasledovat those bol vecer zhnity when zehnat peniaze dieta
They kut plany hrozny kut plany
They said nie zhyraly tvoj gods Nie zhyraly Wadd Suwaa Yaghouth Ya ooq Nasr
They zmylit vela. Therefore let zlomyselny plunge deeper into loss
Because z ich zhresit they drowned assigned hellfire. They nie zalozit helpers chranit them GOD
Noah i said Moj Lord nie lavy single disbeliever zem
if ona let them they len zmylit tvoj servants dat narodenie do nothing zlomyselny disbelievers
Moj Lord forgive mi moj rodicia ktokolvek zapisat moj domov mat rad believer all verit clovek zensky! Nie dat disbelievers anything annihilation
